survey_name: Professional Development Needs for IT Teams Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the professional development needs and preferences of IT professionals to help organizations tailor training programs effectively.

questions.question_text: Which of the following IT skills do you feel you need to improve the most?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple skills if needed. Ensure options are relevant to current IT trends.

script.question_text: Which of the following IT skills do you feel you need to improve the most?

questions.question_text: How do you prefer to receive professional development training?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice preferred to identify the most preferred method. Ensure options cover common training delivery formats.

script.question_text: How do you prefer to receive professional development training?

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in professional development activities?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to gauge frequency. Consider adding a follow-up open-ended question for those who select 'Rarely' or 'Never'.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in professional development activities?

questions.question_text: What barriers do you face in accessing professional development opportunities?
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice format allows identification of multiple barriers. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkbox) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What barriers do you face in accessing professional development opportunities?

questions.question_text: Please describe any specific topics or areas you would like to see covered in future training programs.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Useful for identifying unmet training needs.

script.question_text: Please describe any specific topics or areas you would like to see covered in future training programs.
